data.title: Author event: Peter Bunzl at Gosforth Central Middle School
data.meta_description: Years 4, 5 and 6 enjoyed a fabulous visit to Gosforth Central Middle School to meet the author Peter Bunzl.
data.text:
Years 4, 5 and 6 enjoyed a fabulous visit to Gosforth Central Middle School to meet the author Peter Bunzl.

The boys learned all about what inspired him to become a writer and where he got his ideas for his popular Cogheart series. Many of the boys bought a copy of one of his books and were able to have them dedicated and signed by the author himself.
